# PED::CLEAR_RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS

## Summary
Re-enables ragdoll reactions from various forms of damage, (see enum RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS** flags = 1

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
See SET_RAGDOLL_BLOCKING_FLAGS for flags
